entry.value: %%00010//import Plotly library%%00010const Plotly = arguments[0];%%00010%%00010//Access the Knime Data Table provided by the node%%00010const dataTableRows = knimeDataTable.getRows();%%00010%%00010//Create the plotly HTML element %%00010let div = document.createElement('DIV');%%00010div.setAttribute('id', 'knime-surface-3D');%%00010document.body.append(div);%%00010%%00010//Data preparation%%00010//FORMAT: the first point in each collection should%%00010// be ordered low->high, or high->low%%00010// ex: [[x,...], [x+1,...], [x+2,...]...]%%00010var dataSet = dataTableRows.map(row => row.data);%%00010%%00010//Plotly data object%%00010const surfaceData = [{%%00010 z: dataSet,%%00010 type: 'surface',%%00010 contours: {%%00010 z: {%%00010 show: true,%%00010 usecolormap: true,%%00010 colorscale: 'Jet',%%00010 project: { z: true }%%00010 }%%00010 }%%00010}];%%00010%%00010//Plotly layout object%%00010const surfaceLayout = {%%00010 title: 'Knime Surface Plot Template',%%00010 scene: { %%00010 camera: { %%00010 eye: { %%00010 x: 1.5, %%00010 y: 1.5, %%00010 z: .5 %%00010 } %%00010 } %%00010 }%%00010};%%00010%%00010//Plotly config object%%00010const surfaceConfig = {%%00010%%00010};%%00010%%00010//Draw the plot%%00010Plotly.newPlot('knime-surface-3D', surfaceData, surfaceLayout, surfaceConfig);
